description:
Mountaineering performance for Alaska, Aconcagua, and the Canadian Rockies in winter. The Phantom 6000 HD are ready to go big. Primaloft® insulation and EVA in the inner boot and EVA and Aerogel in the shell combine keep your feet warm up to around 6000m.

  • Shell is durable Cordura, EVA, cork and Primaloft Aerogel for compression-resistant, lightweight warmth
  • Light, tough Kevlar-reinforced Schoeller S-Tech gaiters with a waterproof zipper
  • Weatherproof gaiters feature Super Fabric with HDry® for long-lasting dryness
  • Removable liner uses Primaloft® Black & Primaloft® Gold Eco insulation with Wintherm® technology and reflective aluminum to retain warmth at altitude
  • Quick-lace system is operable with cold or gloved fingers
  • Ortholite® insole cushions underfoot
  • Insole uses carbon fibre and EVA for cushioned control
  • Microporous EVA midsoles are lightweight and absorb shock
  • Vibram® Precision Tech Roll soles retain grip and sensitivity in the cold
  • Compatible with all crampon systems
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
name: Scarpa Phantom 6000 HD Mountaineering Boots - Unisex
